programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa.

programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Vengeance Of The Zombies [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An Indian mystic uses magical chants to raise women from the dead, then sends them out to perform revenge killings for him.

programme.title: King of the Zombies
programme.desc: On a spooky island, three stranded travelers find an evil doctor in control of zombies.

programme.title: Asylum
programme.desc: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

programme.title: Itsy Bitsy
programme.desc: Based on the centuries old poem, a family moves into a secluded mansion where they soon find themselves being targeted by an entity taking the form of a giant spider.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill (1959)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E7 - The Silent Scream
programme.desc: An elderly pet shop owner, who is secretly a former Nazi concentration camp guard, is intent on continuing experiments on human victims.

programme.title: And Now The Screaming Starts!
programme.desc: A young bride to be becomes the victim of her fiance's family's curse.

programme.title: The Monster Club
programme.desc: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him.

programme.title: Lisa And The Devil [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

programme.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night: Part 2
programme.desc: The now-adult Ricky talks to a psychiatrist about how he became a murderer after his brother, Billy, died, which leads back to Mother Superior.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E12 - The Two Faces Of Evil
programme.desc: A family on holiday stop to pick up a mysterious hitch-hiker.

programme.title: Separation
programme.desc: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.

programme.title: A Bay of Blood
programme.desc: The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area.
